import React from 'react' export default function TopMoviesTab(props) { return (

Top Movies

{myMovies.map((movie, index) => { console.log(movie) console.log(key) // If movie status is equal to current key that is set by tab, then display. Also display everything for key 'All movies' if (movie.userStats.status === key || key === "All") { return ( ) } })}
# Image Title Date added Score
{index + 1} {movie.movie.movieItem.original_title} {movie.date} {showRatingNumber(movie.userStats.rating)} { handleClickDelete(movie.movie) }}>
) }
